function (struct LibOrder.Order memory,address) view returns (struct OrderValidator.TraderInfo memory)

nodes.name: getTradersInfo
getBalanceAndAllowance
getBalancesAndAllowances
getERC721TokenOwner

getBalanceAndAllowance(address,bytes).details: Fetches token balances and allowances of an address to given assetProxy. Supports ERC20 and ERC721.

params.assetData: Encoded data that can be decoded by a specified proxy contract when transferring asset.
params.target: Address to fetch balances and allowances of.

getBalanceAndAllowance(address,bytes).return: Balance of asset and allowance set to given proxy of asset.         For ERC721 tokens, these values will always be 1 or 0.

getBalancesAndAllowances(address,bytes[].details: Fetches token balances and allowances of an address for each given assetProxy. Supports ERC20 and ERC721.

params.assetData: Array of encoded byte arrays that can be decoded by a specified proxy contract when transferring asset.
params.target: Address to fetch balances and allowances of.

getBalancesAndAllowances(address,bytes[].return: Balances and allowances of assets.         For ERC721 tokens, these values will always be 1 or 0.

getERC721TokenOwner(address,uint256).details: Calls `token.ownerOf(tokenId)`, but returns a null owner instead of reverting on an unowned token.

params.tokenId: The identifier for the specific NFT.

getERC721TokenOwner(address,uint256).return: Owner of tokenId or null address if unowned.

getOrderAndTraderInfo((address,address,a.details: Fetches information for order and maker/taker of order.

params.takerAddress: Address that will be filling the order.

getOrderAndTraderInfo((address,address,a.return: OrderInfo and TraderInfo instances for given order.

getOrdersAndTradersInfo((address,address.details: Fetches information for all passed in orders and the makers/takers of each order.

params.takerAddresses: Array of taker addresses corresponding to each order.

getOrdersAndTradersInfo((address,address.return: Arrays of OrderInfo and TraderInfo instances that correspond to each order.

getTraderInfo((address,address,address,a.details: Fetches balance and allowances for maker and taker of order.

params.takerAddress: Address that will be filling the order.

getTraderInfo((address,address,address,a.return: Balances and allowances of maker and taker of order.

getTradersInfo((address,address,address,.details: Fetches balances and allowances of maker and taker for each provided order.

params.takerAddresses: Array of taker addresses corresponding to each order.

getTradersInfo((address,address,address,.return: Array of balances and allowances for maker and taker of each order.
